title: If I report someone the game before why am I matched with them the next game?
body:
Seriously. If I reported someone the game before it means I don't want to play with them again (enemy or friendly team).

What do?

replies.body:
Because you queued at the same time


??
Surely there are more than 10 people queuing at the same time.
Because reporting someone has literally **NO** effect on whether you will get matched with them.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=pgqmB00e,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-30T10:45:21.421+0000)
>
> Because reporting someone has literally **NO** effect on whether you will get matched with them.

i think he's asking why it doesn't have an effect
You know you can just wait like a minute or two then queue again to avoid being matched with the same person again right?

I understand that however it is not a 100% guarantee and the point I am trying to make is that we shouldn't have to. :) In some instances I have still been matched with the same people after ~2 minutes of waiting.

Next time you'd like to avoid queueing with someone you reported you're better off not hitting that Play button for a few minutes and then queuing again. Not a guaranteed way to avoid them but it will help.
Because the report system and its desired effects aren't met.
